transcript:
epigram, a fresh one that would be repeated. His hitherto puckered brow became smooth as a sign of pleasure, and with a slight smile he began to examine his nails. 
"Where are you off to?" he said suddenly to Prince Andrew who had risen and was going toward his room. 
"I am going away." 
"Where to?" 
1 That their fire gets into his eyes and he forgets that he ought to be firing at the enemy. 
"To the army." 
"But you meant to stay another two days?" 
"But now I am off at once."
